meanings.definition: Having curls or being in the form of curls.
meanings.sent1: Her hair is the curliest in the class.
meanings.sent2: The poodle had the curliest fur of all the dogs.
meanings.sent3: The curliest fries are always the most popular at the fair.
meanings.sent4: The vines twisted into the curliest shapes in the garden.
meanings.sent5: The curliest ribbon adorned the gift beautifully.

meanings.sent1: She won the award for having the curliest hair.
meanings.sent2: The little girl's hair was the curliest at the party.
meanings.sent3: The competition for the curliest mustache was fierce.
meanings.sent4: His claim to fame was having the curliest beard in town.
meanings.sent5: The museum displayed the curliest piece of art.
